headline: SQM (SQM) Moves 12.3% Higher: Will This Strength Last?
summary: SQM (SQM) witnessed a jump in share price last session on above-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions for the stock doesn't suggest further strength down the road.

headline: PPG Joins Make it Zero to Cut Scope 3 Emissions in DIY Sector
summary: PPG joins a coalition of retailers and suppliers in the DIY sector to tackle the challenges of indirect emissions.

headline: PPG Industries (PPG) Surges 12.5%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: PPG Industries (PPG) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions could translate into further price increase in the near term.
